products.name: Cuspac Real-Time Payments (NPP)
products.description: Enterprise-grade gateway for the New Payments Platform (NPP), enabling 24/7/365 real-time clearing and settlement. Supports Osko, PayID, and PayTo services with sub-second latency.
features: Osko Receive & Send support with overlay service integration
PayTo support for real-time direct debit authorities
Integrated liquidity management and settlement reporting

technical_requirements.connectivity: Direct Connect via BT Radianz or Swift
technical_requirements.hosting: Hybrid Cloud (AWS Outposts compatible) or On-Premise

products.name: Cuspac CDR & Open Banking
products.description: Comprehensive solution for Data Holders to meet Consumer Data Right (CDR) obligations. Includes consent management, API gateway, and conformant data schemas for banking products.
features: Full compliance with ACCC Consumer Data Standards (v5.0+)
Consent Management Dashboard for customer control
Granular scope management (Bank Basic, Bank Detailed, etc.)

technical_requirements.identity_provider: OIDC Compliant IdP (e.g., Okta, Auth0, Ping)

products.name: Cuspac AI Fraud Monitor
products.description: Real-time payment fraud detection using machine learning models trained on consortium data. Specifically tuned to detect APP (Authorized Push Payment) scams, mule accounts, and account takeovers.
features: Real-time scoring (<50ms latency) for in-flight payments
Pre-trained models for APP Scams and CEO Fraud
Explainable AI (XAI) reasoning codes for case analysts
Feedback loop API for model retraining
Consortium data sharing for mule detection

technical_requirements.input_stream: Kafka / Kinesis / MQ or REST API hook
